content: I actually used a new brand of gochujang sauce that I found at the Asian market. It added a really deep flavor to the dish. I've been experimenting with different sauces and oils lately, trying to find the perfect combination. Speaking of oils, do you have any recommendations for a good all-purpose cooking oil? I've been using a newer brand that's more affordable, but I'm not sure if I like it as much as my old favorite.
